apple-pie.recipeDescription: A classic apple pie with a flaky crust and spiced filling.

recipeSteps.instruction: Prepare pie crust with flour and butter.
Fill with sliced apples, sugar, and cinnamon.
Bake in oven until golden brown.

carrot-cake.recipeDescription: Moist carrot cake with cream cheese frosting.

recipeSteps.instruction: Mix flour, sugar, and grated carrots.
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick comes out clean.

chocolate-cake.recipeDescription: Rich chocolate cake with a creamy chocolate frosting.

recipeSteps.instruction: Mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, and eggs.
Pour batter into pan and bake in preheated oven.

beef-soup.recipeDescription: A light and nutritious soup made with beef and vegetables.

recipeSteps.instruction: Cut beef ribs into pieces and blanch briefly in boiling water.
Transfer beef to a pot, add water, and bring to a simmer.
Add chopped carrots, potatoes, and season with salt and pepper.
Boil chicken drumsticks in water to create a broth.
Add diced carrots, potatoes, and salt to the broth and simmer.
Serve hot with chopped parsley.

clam-chowder.recipeDescription: A creamy clam chowder with potatoes and herbs.

recipeSteps.instruction: Sauté onions and celery in oil until soft.
Add clams, potatoes, and broth. Simmer until tender.

egg-drop-soup.recipeDescription: A light Chinese soup with silky egg ribbons.

recipeSteps.instruction: Boil broth and slowly add whisked eggs to form ribbons.
Cook pumpkin with broth and seasonings until soft.
Blend soup until smooth and creamy.

beef-bourguignon.recipeDescription: A rich, French beef stew with red wine and vegetables.

recipeSteps.instruction: Marinate beef in red wine, garlic, and herbs overnight.
Brown beef and vegetables, then simmer with wine and stock.

beef-stew.recipeDescription: A hearty beef stew with vegetables and spices.

recipeSteps.instruction: Cut beef chuck into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper.
Sear the beef chunks in a pot until browned.
Add chopped vegetables and beef stock. Simmer until tender.

beef-tacos.recipeDescription: Classic beef tacos with ground beef and fresh toppings.

recipeSteps.instruction: Cook ground beef with salt, pepper, and paprika until browned.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, and diced tomatoes.

chicken-parmigiana.recipeDescription: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.

recipeSteps.instruction: Coat chicken breasts in breadcrumbs and fry until golden.
Top with marinara sauce and cheese, then bake until cheese melts.

grilled-chicken.recipeDescription: Juicy grilled chicken with herbs and spices.

recipeSteps.instruction: Marinate chicken breasts with oil, salt, pepper, and herbs.
Grill chicken on medium heat until cooked through.

grilled-salmon.recipeDescription: A simple and flavorful grilled salmon with herbs.

recipeSteps.instruction: Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and oil.
Grill the salmon on high heat until cooked through.
Serve hot with lemon wedges and fresh herbs.

mushroom-risotto.recipeDescription: Creamy risotto with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.

recipeSteps.instruction: Sauté mushrooms and onions in oil until soft.
Add rice and cook with broth until creamy.

seafood-paella.recipeDescription: A traditional Spanish rice dish with seafood and vegetables.

recipeSteps.instruction: Cook onion, garlic, and peppers in a pan with olive oil until soft.
Add rice and stir to coat in oil.
Add seafood and cook until done.

shakshuka.recipeDescription: Eggs poached in a spicy tomato and pepper sauce.

recipeSteps.instruction: Cook peppers, tomatoes, and spices until soft.
Make wells in the sauce, then crack eggs into wells and cook until whites are set.

steak-dinner.recipeDescription: Pan-seared steak with roasted potatoes and steamed vegetables.

recipeSteps.instruction: Season steak with salt and pepper, then sear in a hot pan.
Roast potatoes in the oven with oil and salt.
Steam vegetables and serve alongside steak and potatoes.

shrimp-scampi.recipeDescription: Garlic butter shrimp served over pasta.

recipeSteps.instruction: Sauté garlic and shrimp in butter until pink.
Serve shrimp over pasta with lemon and parsley.

spinach-quiche.recipeDescription: A savory quiche with a flaky crust, filled with spinach and cheese.

recipeSteps.instruction: Prepare and bake the pie crust.
Mix spinach, eggs, and cheese, then pour into crust.
Bake until filling is set and golden.

stuffed-bell-peppers.recipeDescription: Bell peppers stuffed with a flavorful mixture of ground beef, rice, and spices.

recipeSteps.instruction: Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Sauté ground beef and rice with spices.
Stuff peppers with beef mixture and bake until tender.

vegetable-curry.recipeDescription: A flavorful vegetarian curry with seasonal vegetables.

recipeSteps.instruction: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell peppers in oil until soft.
Add spices, coconut milk, and vegetables, simmer until tender.

vegetable-stir-fry.recipeDescription: A quick and healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables.

recipeSteps.instruction: Heat oil in a pan and add vegetables.
Add soy sauce and stir-fry until vegetables are tender.

avocado-toast.recipeDescription: A simple avocado toast with seasonings.

recipeSteps.instruction: Mash avocado and season with salt and pepper.
Spread avocado on toasted bread.

chicken-salad.recipeDescription: A refreshing salad with grilled chicken, greens, and a light vinaigrette.

recipeSteps.instruction: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice.
Combine mixed greens, sliced tomatoes, and cucumbers in a bowl.

tuna-salad.recipeDescription: A fresh and easy tuna salad with vegetables.

recipeSteps.instruction: Combine tuna, diced vegetables, and dressing in a bowl.

fruit-salad.recipeDescription: A refreshing fruit salad with a variety of seasonal fruits.

recipeSteps.instruction: Chop fruits into bite-sized pieces and combine.

fettuccine-alfredo.recipeDescription: A creamy and cheesy pasta dish with fettuccine noodles.

recipeSteps.instruction: Boil fettuccine until al dente.
Melt butter, add cream and Parmesan cheese, then mix with fettuccine.

veggie-pasta.recipeDescription: A delicious pasta loaded with fresh vegetables.

recipeSteps.instruction: Boil pasta until al dente and set aside.
Sauté bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots in a pan with olive oil.
Add cooked pasta, salt, pepper, and mix well.

crab-cake.recipeDescription: Crispy and golden crab cakes served with a zesty sauce.

recipeSteps.instruction: Mix crab meat with breadcrumbs, egg, and spices.
Form mixture into cakes and pan-fry until golden.

cornbread.recipeDescription: A soft, buttery cornbread with a golden crust.

recipeSteps.instruction: Mix corn flour, baking powder, and milk to form a batter.
Pour into pan and bake until golden brown.
